title: Hunter Kit (spell)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hunter Kit is a Lunar spell that produces a hunter kit in the player's inventory, filled with various Hunter items. It requires 71 Magic and completion of the Dream Mentor quest to use. The spell's items are somewhat useful for beginning hunters, but has very limited uses for experienced hunters due to the role of the magically-produced items in the skill. Thus the spell is rarely used, as many players find it easier to bank their Hunter gear and only retrieve the items they need.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hunter Kit (spell)
This article is about the spell. For the item, see Hunter Kit.
Hunter Kit
Released 15 May 2007 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 71
Spellbook Lunar
Type Utility
Experience 70
Runes 2 2
Quest Dream Mentor
(plus Lunar Diplomacy)
Description Get a kit of hunter gear
Animation
Sound Effect

Hunter Kit is a Lunar spell that produces a hunter kit in the player's inventory, filled with various Hunter items. It requires 71 Magic and completion of the Dream Mentor quest to use. The spell's items are somewhat useful for beginning hunters, but has very limited uses for experienced hunters due to the role of the magically-produced items in the skill. Thus the spell is rarely used, as many players find it easier to bank their Hunter gear and only retrieve the items they need.

Hunter Kit cannot be cast if there is a hunter kit or a full set of its contents in one's inventory.

The kit contains 8 items in total:

  • Noose wand
  • Butterfly net
  • Bird snare
  • Rabbit snare
  • Teasing stick
  • Unlit torch
  • Box trap
  • Impling jar

Each cast of the spell nets you a profit/loss of 783 if you use a Staff of earth and sell the contents of the hunter kit.

Casting Hunter Kit was once a very good way of cheaply gaining Magic experience. However, the decline in value of the Hunter items has rendered this method of training less efficient than more common methods of Magic training, such as Alchemy spells.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 June 2015
(update | poll)

Hunter kits created with the Lunar spell 'Hunter Kit' now contain impling jars.

[[File:Hunter Kit icon (mobile).png|left]]
'''Hunter Kit''' is a [[Lunar spell]] that produces a [[hunter kit]] in the player's inventory, filled with various [[Hunter]] items. It requires 71 [[Magic]] and completion of the [[Dream Mentor]] [[quest]] to use. The spell's items are somewhat useful for beginning hunters, but has very limited uses for experienced hunters due to the role of the magically-produced items in the skill. Thus the spell is rarely used, as many players find it easier to bank their Hunter gear and only retrieve the items they need.

'''Hunter Kit''' cannot be cast if there is a hunter kit or a full set of its contents in one's inventory.

The kit contains 8 items in total:
*[[Noose wand]]
*[[Butterfly net]]
*[[Bird snare]]
*[[Rabbit snare]]
*[[Teasing stick]]
*[[Unlit torch]]
*[[Box trap]]
*[[Impling jar]]

Each cast of the spell nets you a profit/loss of {{Coins|(({{GEP|Noose wand}}+{{GEP|Butterfly net}}+{{GEP|Bird snare}}+{{GEP|Rabbit snare}}+{{GEP|Teasing stick}}+{{GEP|Unlit torch}}+{{GEP|Box trap}}+{{GEP|Impling jar}}-{{GEP|Astral rune|2}}))}} if you use a [[Staff of earth]] and sell the contents of the hunter kit.

Casting Hunter Kit was once a very good way of cheaply gaining Magic experience. However, the decline in value of the Hunter items has rendered this method of training less efficient than more common methods of Magic training, such as [[Alchemy spells]].
